title: More Chaos, Fewer Chicanes: Paris-Roubaix 2025 Brings Revised Route Through Cobblestone ‘Hell’
content:
ASO confirms key changes to men's race with promise of 'increased intensity' and a new speed-limiting measure for Arenberg; no changes to women's route.

Read the full article at More Chaos, Fewer Chicanes: Paris-Roubaix 2025 Brings Revised Route Through Cobblestone ‘Hell’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
